events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on the highway, seeking to file a claim for damages sustained during the accident.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident following a review of the description involving a vehicle collision and damages.
A claims agent was assigned to handle the vehicle collision claim and to coordinate next steps with the customer.
Customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is under review by the company.
The agent requested copies of the police report, vehicle registration, and photos of the damaged car for further investigation.
Customer submitted all required documents including police report and pictures of the damages to the vehicle involved in the accident.
Investigation into the auto accident claim has started, with the agent reviewing submitted documents and contacting witnesses.
The investigation concluded with confirmation that the other driver was at fault, validating the customer's claim.
A settlement proposal was presented to the customer covering repair costs and rental vehicle reimbursement during the repair period.
Customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the settlement terms and the professionalism of the claims process.
The claim was officially approved after the customer accepted the settlement offer for the auto accident repairs.
Payment covering agreed repair costs and additional expenses was issued promptly to the customer’s bank account.
The auto accident claim was successfully closed following final payment and confirmation that the customer’s vehicle has been repaired.
